subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: José Canseco appeared Tuesday morning on Boomer Esiason and Craig Carton’s program on WFAN Radio to promote his new book, “Vindicated,” but the interview ended abruptly.
snippet: José Canseco appeared Tuesday morning on Boomer Esiason and Craig Carton’s program on WFAN Radio to promote his new book, “Vindicated,” but the interview ended abruptly.
